name: The Skeleton King (OkRetroZone)
description:
This game was made in 72 hours with the help and guidance from my dear friend Silver_Streak (thank you my bud! I am forever in your debt)

Sound Effects from The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection by Juhani Junkala

Music by Avgvst and Spring

Audio files all found on opengameart.org

All other art made by me.

---------------

Once the Lost Cartridge 3 Jam is over I intend to continue to work on this project and finish the boss fight and expand the levels (and make them less of a dingus) 

Thank you so much for scoping out this project.
